text: Krasnogorsk () is a city in Moscow Oblast in Russia. It is the administrative center of Krasnogorsky District of Moscow Oblast. As of 2010, Krasnogorsk has 196,896 people. In 2024, Islamic State killed over 130 people in a massacre at Crocus City Hall. Category:Cities and towns in Moscow Oblast
title: Krasnogorsk, Moscow Oblast
